snippet: The Smithsonian American Art Museum received 100 images by the 20th-century photographer as a gift from the Irving Penn Foundation.
abstract: The Smithsonian American Art Museum received 100 images by the 20th-century photographer as a gift from the Irving Penn Foundation.

headline.main: Irving Penn Photographs to Bolster Smithsonian Collection
headline.print_headline: Irving Penn Photos Go to the Smithsonian
